verses.verse: Now there was a <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4321>Micah.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> "The <S%H505>eleven<s%> <S%H3967><s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> [pieces] of <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H3947>taken<s%> from you, about which you <S%H422>uttered<s%> a <S%H422>curse<s%> in my <S%H241>hearing,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> is with me; I <S%H3947>took<s%> it." And his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be my <S%H1121>son<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

He then <S%H7725>returned<s%> the <S%H505>eleven<s%> <S%H3967><s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> [pieces] of <S%H3701>silver<s%> to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H6942>wholly<s%> <S%H6942>dedicate<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> from my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6459>image<s%> and a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H4541>image;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore, I will <S%H7725>return<s%> them to you."

So when he <S%H7725>returned<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> [pieces] of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to the <S%H6884>silversmith<s%> who <S%H6213>made<s%> them into a <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6459>image<s%> and a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H4541>image,<s%> and they were in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4321>Micah.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4318>Micah<s%> had a <S%H1004>shrine<s%> <S%H430><s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H646>ephod<s%> and <S%H8655>household<s%> <S%H8655>idols<s%> and <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> that he might <S%H1961>become<s%> his <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3477>what<s%> was <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

Now there was a <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man<s%> from <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> was a <S%H3881>Levite;<s%> and he was <S%H1481>staying<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Then the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> from the <S%H5892>city,<s%> from <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to <S%H1481>stay<s%> <S%H834>wherever<s%> he might <S%H4672>find<s%> [a place;] and as he <S%H6213>made<s%> his <S%H1870>journey,<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah.<s%>

And <S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H370>"Where<s%> do you <S%H935>come<s%> from?" And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "I am a <S%H3881>Levite<s%> from <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and I am <S%H1980>going<s%> to <S%H1481>stay<s%> <S%H834>wherever<s%> I may <S%H4672>find<s%> [a place.]"

<S%H4318>Micah<s%> then <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3427>"Dwell<s%> with me and be a father and a <S%H1>priest<s%> to me, and I will <S%H3548>give<s%> you <S%H5414>ten<s%> [pieces] of <S%H6235>silver<s%> a <S%H3701>year,<s%> a <S%H3117>suit<s%> of <S%H6187>clothes,<s%> and your <S%H899>maintenance.<s%>" So the <S%H4241>Levite<s%> <S%H3881>went<s%> [in.]

And the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H2974>agreed<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> with the <S%H376>man;<s%> and the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> to him like <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

So <S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> <S%H3027><s%> the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> and the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> his <S%H3548>priest<s%> and <S%H1961>lived<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah.<s%>

Then <S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6258>"Now<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H3190>prosper<s%> me, <S%H3588>seeing<s%> I <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H3881>Levite<s%> as <S%H3548>priest.<s%>"
